copy.copy: New
New
New
New

Get 3% Daily Cash back with Apple{%nbsp%}Card. And pay for your new iPad over 12 months, interest-free when you choose to check out with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments.{%sosumi type="external" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1â€‘800â€‘MYâ€‘APPLE]({%url metadata="2" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[support.apple.com/102730]({%url metadata="3" destination-type="appleExternal"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value="effectiveDate"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value="rates"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIâ€‘eligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cardâ€™s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cardâ€™s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers: AT&T, Boost Mobile, Tâ€‘Mobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carrierâ€™s terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made online at the following special stores: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last monthâ€™s payment for each product will be the productâ€™s purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="4" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}If you reside in the U.S. territories, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata="5" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}

headline.copy: Get to know iPad. en_WW test 25march

copy.copy: The latest iPad{%nbsp%}Pro, iPad{%nbsp%}Air, and iPad{%nbsp%}mini models are built for Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence, which helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data â€” not even Apple.

_meta.copy: Apple Intelligence is available in beta on iPad{%nbsp%}mini (A17{%nbsp%}Pro) and iPad models with M1 and later, with Siri and device language set to English (Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, or U.S.), as an iPadOS{%nbsp%}18 update. Additional features and Chinese (Simplified), English (India, Singapore), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish language support available in early April, with more languages coming over the course of the year, including Vietnamese. Some features may not be available in all regions or languages.

alt.copy: Keynote with messages slide over showing a custom Genmoji on iPad mini

copy.copy: Writing Tools can proofread your text and rewrite different versions until the tone is just right and summarize selected text with a tap. They're available nearly everywhere you write including third party apps.

alt.copy: Apple Intelligence writing tools feature in Mail on iPad mini

copy.copy: Turn a rough sketch into a related image that complements your notes with Image Wand, make a Genmoji right in the keyboard to match any conversation, and more.

alt.copy: Apple Intelligence feature Image Playground in Freeform on iPad mini

copy.copy: Awareness of your personal context enables Siri to help you in ways that are unique to you. Can't find the name of a book a friend recommended? Siri can help you find what you're looking for without compromising your privacy.

alt.copy: Apple Intelligence featuring contextual search with Siri on iPad mini with Smart Folio

heading.copy: Designed to protect your privacy at every step.

copy.copy: With Private Cloud Compute, Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence can draw on larger Apple-designed server-based models, running on Apple{%nbsp%}silicon, to handle more complex requests while protecting your privacy.

alt.copy: Privacy Apple logo

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad is built for Apple Intelligence. It helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly with groundbreaking privacy protections.

alt.copy: An underwater scene created in Image Playground, a new Apple Intelligence feature with Notes in the background

headline.copy: Your workplace can be any place.
Your workplace can be any place.

copy.copy: There's never been a more joyful way of getting stuff done than with iPad. Designed for Multi-Touch simple gestures help you get around smoothly and quickly. Add an Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil to write and draw your ideas or attach a keyboard to rip through your inbox.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} And do it all with the game-changing performance of Apple{%nbsp%}silicon.

alt.copy: Top view of iPad Pro attached to the Magic Keyboard and Apple Pencil Pro sitting next to it

copy.copy: Connect with family friends and your team wherever you go. Speedy Wi-Fi lets you download upload and transfer whatever documents folders and files you need from just about anywhere. And with 5G you can stay connected even when you're away from Wi-Fi.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. For details on 5G support contact your carrier and see :[apple.com/ipad/cellular]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

alt.copy: Two iPads shown, one showcasing a Facetime video call and the other one featuring the Pages app

heading.copy: Store what's important. Get to it with ease.

copy.copy: Organize, share, and get to all your stuff with the Files app. And easily access and manage whatâ€™s on your iPad, in iCloud, or on cloud services like Box.

alt.copy: iPad Air showcasing the Files app

modalPageDescription.copy: Work from anywhere with iPad. Connect with friends, family, and your team wherever you are. Add Apple Pencil or attach a keyboard and do even more.

alt.copy: A person using an iPad and Apple Pencil outdoors

headline.copy: Take your inner artist out and about.
Take your inner artist out and about.

copy.copy: With a fully immersive touchscreen iPad is a canvas that's ready for you to express your most creative self. From 3D sculpting and composing a beat to painting a masterpiece in Adobe Fresco iPad is where your most creative ideas come to life.

alt.copy: Two iPads and an iPad Air featuring FlipaClip, Adobe Fresco and GarageBand apps

heading.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil is the ultimate creative tool.

copy.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil lets you easily sketch a new idea in Notes, finish a watercolor in Procreate, or draw up production-ready architectural plans in SketchUp.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

alt.copy: An iPad Air showcasing a Procreate drawing that's spreading out into the background

heading.copy: Take your best shot. And video.

copy.copy: iPad has powerful front and back cameras that allow you to create feature films, high-quality photos, and other amazing content. Apps like Final Cut Pro and Adobe Lightroom let you shoot, edit, and share â€” all from one portable device.

alt.copy: Two iPads showcasing Final Cut Pro 2.0 and Photos apps

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad brings creative ideas to life. Paint a masterpiece, compose music, or draw up architectural plans. Shoot feature films and high-quality photos.

alt.copy: Close up of an illustration created in Procreate

copy.copy: With fast Wi-Fi and cellular capabilities, built-in cameras help you create powerful connections wherever you are. Join class, attend a lecture on Zoom, tackle a group project on FaceTime, or simply stay in touch with colleagues and classmates from all over.

alt.copy: A pair of hands holding an iPad Pro showcasing a group Facetime call

copy.copy: Jump-start your notes and projects with accessories that were made for iPad.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} Grab an Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil and take handwritten and digital notes or connect a keyboard and make quick work of all your emails, essays, and presentations.

alt.copy:
Side view of iPad Air showcasing the Keynote app
 attached to the Magic Keyboard with a hand resting on the trackpad and an Apple Pencil sitting nearby

copy.copy: iPad is perfect for learning something new. From step-by-step instructions with Kitchen Stories to zipping through a self-guided course there's an app for whatever â€” and however â€” you want to learn including immersive augmented reality apps.

alt.copy: An iPad and iPad Air showcasing the Jigspace and Kitchen Stories apps

modalPageDescription.copy: Learn from anywhere with iPad. Attend a lecture, take incredible notes, tackle a group project or learn something new with tons of apps for iPad.

alt.copy: A person sitting on the floor of a classroom using an iPad

headline.copy: Kick back. Tune in. Game on.
Kick back. Tune in. Game on.

heading.copy: Always have your favorite content with you.

copy.copy: iPad is a 24/7 all-access pass to your favorite movies, TV shows, books, and music wherever you are.

alt.copy: Two iPads and an iPad Air showcasing the Apple Music, Apple TV+, and Apple Books apps

heading.copy: A home theater in your hands.

copy.copy: With an immersive display, amazing speakers, and advanced display technologies like ProMotion, all your content looks and sounds amazing.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: The displays have rounded corners. When measured diagonally as a rectangle the 13-inch iPad{%nbsp%}Pro is 13 inches the 11-inch iPad{%nbsp%}Pro is 11.1 inches the 13-inch iPad{%nbsp%}Air is 12.9 inches the 11-inch iPad{%nbsp%}Air and iPad (10th generation) are 10.86 inches and the iPad{%nbsp%}mini is 8.3 inches. Actual viewable area is less.

alt.copy: A pair of hands holding an iPad Pro showcasing the TV app while it plays the show "Monarch: Legacy of Monsters"

copy.copy: The power of Apple{%nbsp%}silicon combined with a stunning display makes iPad the ultimate immersive gaming experience. Level up by attaching a keyboard or mouse. You can even connect a controller to create a portable console and play games like Call of DutyÂ®: Warzoneâ„¢ Mobile.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

alt.copy: An iPad Air showcasing "Call of Duty: Warzone" game with an external controller sitting on top of it

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad is a 24/7 all-access pass to your favorite movies, TV shows, books, and music wherever you are. Play games on the ultimate immersive display.

alt.copy: Gaming screen showing dynamic graphics

headline.copy: Dream it up. Jot it down.
Dream it up. Jot it down.

heading.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil sets the standard for drawing, writing, and note-taking.

copy.copy: Keep a journal, quickly jot down a grocery list, and take amazing class notes. Want to convert those notes to text? No problem. iPad is ready to capture every thought.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil Pro drawing on an iPad Pro showcasing the Notes app

copy.copy: Whether it's designing something beautiful in Procreate brushing up your photos in Affinity Photo 2 or finishing your home project in Shapr3D Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil has the ability to bring your creative ideas to life with incredible precision.

alt.copy: A collection of five different iPads showcasing different apps including Affinity Photo 2, Procreate, Affinity Designer 2, and Procreate Dreams

heading.copy: Special features to help your workflow.

copy.copy: With iPadOS, Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil feels more like writing on paper. Easily sign documents, mark up screenshots, write in text fields, and even leave a note over an app or screen with Quick Notes.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil Pro marking up a Safari screenshot on an iPad Pro

modalPageDescription.copy: With iPad, Apple Pencil sets the standard for drawing, writing, and note-taking. Draw, sign documents, or mark up anything with incredible precision.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil with colorful lettering in Notes

copy.copy: Designed for the large Multi-Touch display, iPadOS is the operating system that makes iPad so powerful and easy to use. It pushes the capabilities of iPad further â€” all using the power of touch.

alt.copy: A pair of hands holding an iPad Pro showcasing Stage Manager to multitask between Calendar, Freeform, Mail, Pages, and the Photos app

heading.copy: Powerful and capable from the start.

copy.copy: Essential Apple-designed apps like Keynote, Numbers, Pages, and more were created to take full advantage of the unique power and versatility of iPad.

alt.copy: An iPad Pro showcasing Springboard and the different widgets available

heading.copy: Over a million other ways to use it.

copy.copy: Turn your iPad into almost anything â€” from a math classroom or workstation to a professional recording studio â€” with apps from the App{%nbsp%}Store. With over a million apps made just for iPad there's something for everyone.

alt.copy: A collection of six different iPads showcasing different apps including Goodnotes 6, Affinity Designer 2, Microsoft Word, Procreate, Microsoft Excel, and Affinity Photo 2

modalPageDescription.copy: iPadOS is the operating system that lets you touch, type, and draw on one magical device. With tons of apps for iPad, thereâ€™s something for everyone.

alt.copy: An iPad Pro showing Freeform and Notes in Stage Manager

accessibilityText.copy: Previous item in Get to know iPad gallery
Next item in Get to know iPad gallery

bodyCopy.copy: Stay connected, set limits, share purchases and more{%shyp%}with family features built into iPad.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about built-in features designed for families.

bodyCopy.copy: Dream it up. Jot it down.

bodyCopy.copy: Type it out. Take it with you.

headline.copy: Why Apple is the best{%br%}place to buy iPad. - rollout test

bodyCopy.copy: When you choose to check out with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments.{%sosumi type="external" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1â€‘800â€‘MYâ€‘APPLE]({%url metadata="2" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[support.apple.com/102730]({%url metadata="3" destination-type="appleExternal"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value="effectiveDate"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value="rates"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIâ€‘eligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cardâ€™s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cardâ€™s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers: AT&T, Boost Mobile, Tâ€‘Mobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carrierâ€™s terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made online at the following special stores: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last monthâ€™s payment for each product will be the productâ€™s purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="4" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}If you reside in the U.S. territories, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata="5" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}

headline.copy: Save :[up to {%pricing id="slug:family_ipad_pro" template="credit.display.smart" type="tradein"%}]({%pricing-fallback id="slug:family_ipad_pro" type="tradein" collapse="true"%}) with Apple Trade In.

bodyCopy.copy: Get credit towards your next iPad when you trade in an eligible device.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple Gift Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple Gift Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Appleâ€™s trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.

headline.copy: Trade in your eligible device for credit.

inlineHeader.copy: Just add a trade-in when you choose a new product. Once your eligible device has been received and verified, we'll credit the value to your payment method. Or choose to check out with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments and we'll apply the credit instantly. Terms apply.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple Gift Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple Gift Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Appleâ€™s trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.

headline.copy: Save on a new iPad with education pricing.

bodyCopy.copy: Available to college students and educators.

headline.copy: Shop our Education Store and save.

inlineHeader.copy: You can save on a new iPad, Mac, and more with Apple education pricing. It's available to current and newly accepted college students and their parents, as well as faculty, staff, and homeschool teachers of all grade levels.{%sosumi type="promoted" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Apple education pricing is available to current and newly accepted university students, parents buying for university students, and teachers and staff at all levels. For more information, visit :[apple.com/store]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

bodyCopy.copy: Engrave your new iPad with a mix of emoji, names, initials and numbers.

inlineHeader.copy: Choose from new engraving options. Itâ€™s the perfect way to personalize your iPad. Add a special message, name, or birthday. Even combine text and numbers with your favorite emoji.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: You can return your iPad even if you engrave it. And when youâ€™re ready to upgrade, it wonâ€™t change your trade-in value.

bodyCopy.copy: iPad is perfect for taking the content you capture on iPhone and bringing it to life on an immersive canvas. You can shoot videos and photos on your iPhone and use the large display of your iPad to edit, add animations, and more. You can also pick up wherever you left off with Handoff.

alt.copy: An iPhone 15 and iPad side-by-side highlighting how a photo taken with the camera on iPhone can be marked up in the Photos app on iPad

bodyCopy.copy: iPad and Mac are designed to work together to form the ultimate creative setup. Sketch on your iPad and have it appear instantly on your Mac with Sidecar. Then use your iPad for drawing or editing with Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil or as a second display. Extend your workflow to new places, and when you return to your desk, Universal Control allows you to use one mouse or trackpad seamlessly across both devices.

alt.copy: An iPad and MacBook Pro side-by-side highlighting how a photo edited on iPad can be used in a Pages document on a Mac

bodyCopy.copy: iPad is a great way to optimize your workouts while tracking your progress on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch. See personal metrics from Apple{%nbsp%}Watch integrated on the screen of your iPad in real time. The sensors in Apple{%nbsp%}Watch combine with advanced algorithms to provide data that keeps you motivated. And see it all come together on your Health app on iPad.

alt.copy: An Apple Watch Series 9 and iPad side-by-side highlighting how an Apple Fitness+ workout on iPad is tracked on Apple Watch
